item.title: North Korea bans foreigners from seaside resort weeks after opening
item.description: Tourism authorities say foreigners are "temporarily" not allowed to visit the Wonsan Kalma resort.

item.title: Colbert says The Late Show will end after 33 years
item.description: Network CBS called it a financial decision tied to the "challenging backdrop in late night" TV.

item.title: Kill Russian soldiers, win points: Is Ukraine's new drone scheme gamifying war?
item.description: The scheme allows Ukrainian troops to trade videos of confirmed kills on the battlefield for prizes.

item.title: Trump orders officials to release Epstein court documents after mounting pressure
item.description: Trump's supporters and opponents alike have demanded more disclosures related to the disgraced financier.

item.title: Watch: Police evacuate residents as wildfires rage in Spain
item.description: Spanish authorities estimate that 2,500 hectares (25sq km) of land have been affected in the Toledo region.
